question: What will God do to those who hide at the bottom of the sea (Am 9:3)?
choice: The waves of the sea will roll over them
A great fish will swallow them

choice: When they flee to the desert and hide in the caves
When they lock their city gates

When their enemies have driven them into exile

Like what does the whole land react (Am 9:5)?

choice: He calls for the waters of the sea
He brings them down from heaven

choice: Disaster will not overtake or meet us

choice: So they can live in peace and security
So they once again can journey to Zion
